file_content.text: Stop! Identify yourself or die!
Shadow, here. Dispatching Armageddon Battalion to secure the bunker you cleared. But there's been an attack on Darth Vowrawn and your crew.
They said to patch you through when you called. Doing so now...
So, I guess you heard the news. Some super-fast, mega-potent baddie. We're on the run now.
Taking Vowrawn to a safe house in the Imperial Legislature. He wants you to meet us there.
Don't look back, Vette. Get to safety.
Be swift.
My ears are pinned back, believe me. I don't want to get caught by that killing machine.
Tell me you destroyed the attacker.
Is the assassin dead?
That's a laugh. I don't think we even scratched him!
Everything goes to pot when I'm not there.
I'm disappointed.
Sorry! It took everything we had just to escape and get some distance.
Vowrawn would be dead if Quinn hadn't taken one for the team. Real heroic stuff. He's unconscious but alive.
Gotta sign off now. Almost to the safe house. See you there!
Apologies, my lord. The attack was sudden. Unknown assailant, very powerful.
On the run now. Taking Vowrawn to a safe house in the Imperial Legislature. He wants you to meet us there.
I want him off the streets, lieutenant. Get to safety as fast as you can.
Make it quick.
We've put some distance between us and the attacker. Now I'm beelining it.
Tell me the attacker has been killed.
Is the assassin dead?
Way out of our league, my lord. Lucky we got out of there in one piece.
This is a black mark on your record and reputation, Pierce.
Sounds like you screwed up.
By all rights, we should all be dead. This was the toughest enemy Baras has thrown at us.
Quinn jumped in and took the brunt of the assault. Got him stabilized and in tow.
Almost to the safe house. Signing off now.
Relax, Shadow, Darth Vowrawn sent me.
I'm a friend.
You better think twice before threatening me again.
Stand down, Imperial.
On your best day, you couldn't kill me.
Don't make me laugh.
What? Speak up, my ears are still ringing from artillery fire.
Relax and rely on your eyes--obviously I am on your side.
Vowrawn sent me.
To take your mind off your ringing ears.
[Choke Shadow.]
Ack... ugh....
Now listen carefully. I've come for the information you've acquired for Darth Vowrawn.
Apologies. Apologies, my lord. The artillery rattled me.
If we speak too loudly, this place will no longer be a secret.
Shh. Don't blow our cover.
Yes. Yes, I see, of course. I'm sorry, my lord. The ringing in my ears has unnerved me.
I have a lead on Darth Baras's other spy. A team of Jedi have secretly landed on Corellia.
I intercepted a transmission from one of them to Baras, conveying readiness to lead the other Jedi into a death trap.
Can you identify which of the Jedi is the spy?
What is his name?
They only communicated in numeric code. No names were used. I can't even say if it's a woman or a man. Human or alien.
I wish I could give you more to go on.
Can you provide me with the Jedi team's location?
Tell me where to go.
That I can.
They'll run into me first.
I will be the trap.
Since I don't know which is Baras's spy, I was going to recommend to Darth Vowrawn that all be killed.
The Jedi are gearing up in a Republic staging bunker. Enemy special forces deploy there, so it'll be a high-risk invasion.
I'll clear out that bunker.
Won't be tough for me.
I've never heard of anyone taking on so many enemies at once, especially with a room full of Jedi waiting at the end.
Return to Vowrawn when you're able.
Your job is done.
I'll rest up and make my way back to base.
Your opinion is inconsequential.
Reserve the speculation.
I apologize if that information was unwanted. Darth Vowrawn encourages my assessments.
When you're done, you can contact me from outside the bunker and I'll have Armageddon Battalion secure the area.
I'll report back to Vowrawn now. More power to you, my lord.
Don't make me laugh.
Stand down, Imperial.
I'm a friend.
